name: Mehedi Hasan Munna
story: Munna has been instrumental in organizing tree plantation drives, planting over 2,000 trees in urban areas this year.

name: Razia Sultana
story: Razia has led 15 community food drives, providing meals to over 3,000 underprivileged families.

name: Shirin Akter
story: Shirin has dedicated herself to rescuing and rehabilitating stray animals in her city, creating shelters for over 100 animals.

name: Razu
story: Razu has organized multiple blood donation camps, successfully encouraging over 1,200 individuals to donate blood.
